```{r num2}
rows <- 5
cols <- 5

for (i in 1:rows) {
  for (j in 1:cols) {
    if (j <= i) {
      cat("* ")
    } else {
      cat("  ")
    }
  }
  cat("\n")
}

```
```{r num3 }
n <- as.integer(readline(prompt = "Enter a number to start the Fibonacci sequence: "))

a <- 0
b <- 1

cat(a, " ")

repeat {

  next_term <- a + b
  

  if (next_term > 500) {
    break
  }
  
  cat(next_term, " ")
  
  a <- b
  b <- next_term
}

cat("\n")

```
